import { useState } from "react"; import NextButton from "./NextButton"; import TextField from "./TextField" const optionTwo = ['Male', 'Female', 'Other (please specify):' ] const QuestionOne = () => { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(null); const onChange = (optionID) => { setSelected((optionID)) } return (
{optionTwo.map((option,optionID) => (
onChange(optionID)} />
))}
.
); } export default QuestionOne;
